mapper.sql: id, agreement_id, agreement_name, agreement_scene, agreement_type, agreement_version, effective_time, submit_status, is_deleted, created_at, created_by, modified_at, modified_by
mapper.select: select ua.* from ( select agreement_type, agreement_scene, MAX (agreement_version+0) AS agreement_version from user_agreement where submit_status = 2 and agreement_scene = 1 and effective_time <= NOW() and is_delete = 0 and agreement_type = #{agreementType} group by agreement_type , agreement_scene ) as t left join user_agreement as ua on (t.agreement_type = ua.agreement_type and t.agreement_scene = ua.agreement_scene and t.agreement_version = ua.agreement_version );

select ua.* from ( agreement_type, agreement_scene, MAX(agreement_version + 0) as agreement_version from user_agreement where submit_status = 2 and agreement_scene = #{scene} and effective_time <= NOW() and is_delete = 0 group by agreement_type , agreement_scene) as t left join user_agreement as ua on( t.agreement_type = ua.agreement_type and t.agreement_scene = ua.agreement_scene and t.agreement_version = ua.agreement_version)

select
from user_agreement
agreement_id in
#{item}
and submit_stauts=2 and effective_time <= NOW() and record_status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into user_agreement (agreement_id, agreement_name, agreement_scene, agreement_type, agreement_version, effective_time, submit_status, is_deleted, created_at, created_by, modified_at, modified_by, agreement_content) values (#{agreementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementScene,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{agreementType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{agreementVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{submitStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agreementContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update user_agreement
agreement_id = #{agreementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agreement_name = #{agreementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agreement_scene = #{agreementScene,jdbcType=TINYINT},
agreement_type = #{agreementType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
agreement_version = #{agreementVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
submit_status = #{submitStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modified_at = #{modifiedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_by = #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
agreement_content = #{agreementContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_agreement set agreement_id = #{agreementId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agreement_name = #{agreementName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agreement_scene = #{agreementScene,jdbcType=TINYINT}, agreement_type = #{agreementType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, agreement_version = #{agreementVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, submit_status = #{submitStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_at = #{modifiedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agreement_content = #{agreementContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
